title: Himi 117
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
’Oku fakaongolelei
‘E he kakai ‘o hēvani;
‘A e ‘Afiona ‘Eiki,
Ko honau Huhu’i koe.
2.
Fakafeta’i fai ma’u ai pē
Sīsū, ki he ‘Afiona;
He ko homau hifo koe,
Pea mahu’inga ma’u pē.
3.
’Eiki tuku ‘a e poto,
Ki ho’o kau tamaio’eiki;
Ke nau fa’a lea’aki,
Ho’o Folofola lelei.
4.
’E ‘Otua ‘o e ‘ofa
Ke ke fakaongo atu,
Ho’o Folofola ‘ofa,
Ki māmani kotoa pē.
5.
‘Eiki ke tau’i pea ma’u
‘E ho’o Folofola lelei
‘A e vete kotoa pē
‘O e pekia mo heli. *
